languages.text: "Благодарю за беседу, губернатор. Я узнал что хотел".
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за беседу, губернатор. Я узнал что хотел".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learnt everything I wanted to know."
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learnt everything I wanted to know."
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learnt everything I wanted to know."
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learnt everything I wanted to know."
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."
"Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

languages.text: “谢谢你愿意和我谈话，总督。我想知道的事情，已经都了解清楚了。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你愿意和我谈话，总督。我想知道的事情，已经都了解清楚了。”

languages.text: «Gracias por la conversación, gobernador. He averiguado todo lo que quería saber».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la conversación, gobernador. He averiguado todo lo que quería saber».

languages.text: "Sohbetiniz için teşekkür ederim Vali. Öğrenmek istediklerimi öğrendim."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: "Sohbetiniz için teşekkür ederim Vali. Öğrenmek istediklerimi öğrendim."

languages.text: 「総督、時間くれてありがとう。知りたかったことは全部わかった」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: 「総督、時間くれてありがとう。知りたかったことは全部わかった」

languages.text: « Merci pour cette conversation, gouverneur. J'ai appris tout ce que je voulais savoir. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour cette conversation, gouverneur. J'ai appris tout ce que je voulais savoir. »

languages.text: "Danke für das Gespräch, Gouverneur. Ich habe alles erfahren, was ich wissen wollte."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for the conversation, Governor. I have learned everything I wanted to know."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für das Gespräch, Gouverneur. Ich habe alles erfahren, was ich wissen wollte."
